app.title: Typhoon Slide
app.description: Create professional slide decks in minutes with Typhoon Slide - powered by OpenTyphoon's state-of-the-art AI technology

hero.title: Create Stunning Presentations with AI
hero.subtitle: Typhoon Slide leverages cutting-edge LLM technology to transform your ideas into professional presentations in seconds. Built with OpenTyphoon.

features.title: Powerful AI Features
features.subtitle: Experience the future of presentation creation with Typhoon's advanced AI capabilities

feature1.title: AI-Powered Content Generation
feature1.description: Generate complete professional slide content with a simple prompt. Typhoon's LLM understands context and creates cohesive presentations.

feature2.title: Advanced Markdown Support
feature2.description: Create slides using familiar Markdown syntax with real-time preview. Format text, add lists, and structure content effortlessly.

feature3.title: Professional-Grade Output
feature3.description: Get presentation-ready slides with optimized layout, engaging content flow, and professional styling - all created by Typhoon AI.

usage.title: How to Use Typhoon Slide
usage.step1: Edit the markdown content directly or ask the AI to generate it
usage.step2: Preview your slides in real-time with automatic formatting
usage.step3: Refine your presentation with AI assistance for professional results

conclusion.title: Experience the Future of Presentations
conclusion.startCreating: Start creating AI-powered slides now with Typhoon!

editor.emptySlideMessage: Your AI-generated slides will appear here. Start by writing in the editor or asking Typhoon AI to create presentation content for you.

callToAction.title: Transform Ideas Into Presentations Instantly
callToAction.subtitle: Experience how Typhoon's AI technology can help you create professional, engaging presentations 10x faster than traditional methods.

methodology.title: Typhoon's Advanced AI Slide Generation Technology
methodology.subtitle: Our state-of-the-art large language model transforms your ideas into compelling presentations through a sophisticated 5-step process

understanding.title: Intelligent Request Analysis
understanding.description: Typhoon's AI analyzes your request in detail to extract key parameters like audience, presentation goals, and specific requirements.
understanding.content: The advanced language model extracts critical parameters from your prompt: target audience, presentation objectives, slide constraints, and specific task requirements (creation, editing, or interactive assistance).

planning.title: Strategic Presentation Planning
planning.description: Based on extracted parameters, Typhoon AI creates a comprehensive slide-by-slide plan for optimal information flow.
planning.content: The AI planner creates a sophisticated semantic structure with each slide's type, headline, key message, and supporting content points, ensuring a coherent narrative flow optimized for audience engagement.

extracting.title: Smart Content Extraction
extracting.description: For each slide, Typhoon AI identifies and extracts the most relevant information to effectively support your key messages.
extracting.content: Each slide is enhanced with carefully extracted key facts, compelling expressions, and strategic storytelling elements designed to maximize the impact of your presentation and maintain audience attention.

generating.title: AI-Powered Slide Generation
generating.description: Individual slides are generated with optimal content distribution and formatting based on presentation best practices.
generating.content: Each slide is meticulously crafted with clear focus points, visually engaging language, and adherence to professional presentation design principles - all generated by Typhoon's advanced AI.

refining.title: Intelligent Presentation Refinement
refining.description: The entire presentation undergoes AI-driven refinement to ensure narrative coherence, visual consistency, and professional polish.
refining.content: The final refinement process ensures smooth transitions between slides, consistent formatting throughout, and a compelling story arc that builds to your key message - all optimized by Typhoon's presentation AI.
